sen.j: 仁王門通（におうもんどおり）は京都市左京区の東西の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Niomon-dori Street is one of the east and west street in Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Niomon-dori Street is a street running east-west through Sakyo-Ward, Kyoto City.
Niomon-dori Street is a street running east-west through Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 蹴上交差点から東大路通までは2車線の広い道で三条通のバイパスとして機能している。
sen.e: Wide 2 driveways street from the crossing on the street to Higashioji-dori Street is worked as a bypass of Sanjo-dori Street.
Two wide lanes from the intersection to Higashioji-dori Street act as a bypass for Sanjo-dori Street.
Two wide lanes from the intersection to Higashioji-dori Street act as a bypass for Sanjo-dori Street.

sen.j: 琵琶湖疏水を隔てた北には岡崎の文化施設の並ぶ一角がある。
sen.e: There is a corner lined with cultural facilities in north of Okazaki across the Lake Biwa Canal.
There is a corner lined with cultural facilities north of Okazaki across the Lake Biwa Canal.
There is a corner lined with cultural facilities north of Okazaki across the Lake Biwa Canal.

sen.j: 東大路通から川端通までは西行一方通行の狭い道で住商混在の通りである。
sen.e: The street from Higashioji-dori street to Kawabata-dori Street is a narrow one-way that mix of residence and commercial.
The street from Higashioji-dori street to Kawabata-dori Street is a narrow one-way street that is a mix of residential and commercial elements.
The street from Higashioji-dori street to Kawabata-dori Street is a narrow one-way street that is a mix of residential and commercial elements.

sen.j: 仁王門通の名称は沿道の頂妙寺の仁王門に由来するという。
sen.e: The name of Nimon-dori Street came from Nio Gate of Chomyo-ji Temple on the street.
The name Nimon-dori Street comes from the Nio Gate of Chomyo-ji Temple, located on the street.
The name Niomon-dori Street comes from the Nio-mon Gate of Chomyo-ji Temple, located on the street.
sen.cmt: Nimon-dori→Niomon-dori Streetに修正、およびNio-mon Gateとしました。

sen.j: 公共交通
sen.cmt: 頭文字を大文字に変更

sen.j: 京都市営地下鉄
京都市営地下鉄東西線
- 蹴上駅
バス路線は設定されていない。
蹴上交差点から東大路通までは京都市電蹴上線が通っていた。
sen.e: Kyoto City Railway, Keage Line used to run from the crossing at Keage to Higashioji-dori Street.
sen.cmt: 京都市電蹴上線→Kyoto City Railway, Keage Line[定訳不明]
sen.e: Kyoto City Railway, Keage Line used to run from the crossing at Keage to Higashioji-dori Street.
Kyoto City Railway, the Keage Line used to run from the crossing at Keage to Higashioji-dori Street.
sen.cmt: "Keage Line"→"the Keage Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 沿道の主な施設

sen.j: 蹴上発電所
琵琶湖疏水と蹴上インクライン

Lake Biwa Canal and Keage Incline
Lake Biwa Canal and Keage Incline

sen.j: ウェスティン都ホテル京都（都ホテル）
金地院
南禅寺 以上蹴上交差点
sen.e: Nanzen-ji Temple: Keage intersection for the places mentioned above

sen.j: 京都市国際交流会館

京都市美術館
京都国立近代美術館 以上神宮道上ル
sen.e: National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto:
National Museum of Modern Art, Kyoto:

sen.j: 京都文教中学校・高等学校 古川町通下ル
